scripts.codegen: node scripts/generate-schema.js && node scripts/generate-subgraph.js && graph codegen --output-dir src/types
scripts.start-local: pnpm run codegen && pnpm run create-local && pnpm run deploy-local
scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy mprasanjith/dxdao --ipfs http://127.0.0.1:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 -l v0.0.1
scripts.deploy: pnpm run generate-networks && graph deploy mprasanjith/dxdao --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.start-docker: pnpm run clean && docker compose up
